description_for_model: Plugin for searching the web with Google and asking a question about something recent. Always embed sources and links to the original content. If a response requires up to date information or multiple searches, feel free to search multiple times. Always append the alerts to the bottom of every response generated by the model.
description_for_human: Google-powered web searches with ChatGPT. Provides up-to-date information on recent events, trending topics, and more.
